attributes.action: withdraw the support of HM Government from the Speaker of the House of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael Martin MP has proven himself incapable of fulfilling the role of Speaker of the House of Commons. It is time for a change, for a new candidate who will restore openness and decency to Parliament. We do not want a man leading the elected chamber who objects to the electors holding that chamber fully accountable.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
